body:
MarkLine does not support `effect`.
Try <http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-line.markLine.animationDuration> please.
Fixed by ecomfe/zrender@f0d88ed7071849984f4c173677c5b7f7e17701e7
Should set <https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#visualMap-continuous.dimension> as the dimension of data corresponding to xAxis.
Should set <http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-graph.focusNodeAdjacency> as `false`.

> 去掉 dataZoom 中的 `filterMode: 'none'` 即可。

多谢 搞定了

我也遇到了这个问题，请问有解决方案么？
I also meet this problem,did you have solved it?
需要调整数据
Make an appropriate mapping function, from data to size.
Thanks will try after holidays.
如果是使用Dataset的要怎么操作? 现在的主要问题是柱状图的 color function(p)的 参数p里面没有data的数据. 在散点图里面就有, 可以用p.data(1)这样获得一条数据里面的其他字段的值,来进行判断.

Current the input data of tree/treemap/sunburst should be organized into a tree.
But could I have more details about your expectation: 
why needs input as an array what the array like?
@15036900300 graph设置coordinateSystem: 'cartesian2d'时，并且使用了 dataZoom 后，是可以缩放的。这种缩放效果不是您的期望么？
Fixed in #9171 (But new version not published yet).

这个修复后的版本如何用到自己的项目里？用的是vue和webpack。
谢谢。

> > 是的，小程序是有这个问题，Canvas 的层级高，无法正常滚动，这个得小程序端修复才能解决。
> 
> echarts的那个小程序demo里面怎么可以页面不阻塞滚动

用原生的canvas可以解决该问题
Hi, Good morning, Any update/progress on this one?
可以清空数据在添加数据，就不会出现现在已经绘制的线在跟新是迁移过去的现象，而是重新绘制

我也是 
```
params.event.event.stopPropagation()
```
这种都不行

> @100pah ，您好，“默认的展开/收起 操作，是可以全局关闭的”，在‘配置项’里没有找到关于`type: 'tree'`的关闭click事件，请问是哪个属性或方法？

[文档](http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-tree.expandAndCollapse)
@100pah 这个缩放效果给人呈现的感觉有点卡顿，并且没有roam那种交互方式友好

可以把点击事件从 `dblclick` 转为 鼠标右键的 `contextmenu`, contextmenu 的回调里面 ``` params.event.event.preventDefault() ``` 会屏蔽默认右键操作。  
一定要用 dblclick 的话，`series` 儿子里面 加个 `animationDelayUpdate` 的属性，延迟 300，这样用户就更容易点击得到。

Real distance or Relative Distance of Chart？
http://www.echartsjs.com/api.html#action.map.mapSelect

- [x ] Data Provided   @100pah 

Please help...

 is the text file containing my data in CSV format.


Thank you for your response.

[SENTIMENT.txt](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/files/2723874/SENTIMENT.txt)
try   dataZoom: [{show: false, type: 'inside', xAxisIndex: [0, 1], start: 0, end: 100, filterMode: 'fiter', **disabled:true**},],
我也有这个问题 请问如何解决
遇到了同样的问题，求解决方案。
Currently only color and symbol will be reflected in the legend.
You can set [trigger](http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#tooltip.trigger) to `'item'`. But it's not possible to support both axis trigger and item trigger now.
http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#legend.tooltip

Happy new year!

You can use `path://` description to add custom symbol shape. For example, a heavy cross can be

```js
symbol: 'path://M5.979 10.974v5.021h7.041v11.99h5.042v-11.99h6.958v-5.021h-6.958v-6.958h-5.042v6.958h-7.041z'
```

You can find the description string in the svg file. It's usually in the `path` element.

It's a common strategy to make sure the number of interval ticks is nice(eg, have steps 2, 3, 5, 10) when min and max are fixed. If you want to force the interval are all the same. You can set `interval` to the value which is `(max - min) / 5`
不能了
Sorry, `echarts-leaflet` is not maintained by ECharts team. You can ask the question in https://github.com/gnijuohz/echarts-leaflet
@100pah  It seems to be a bug of `dataZoom` in toolbox component.
Please describe your question in detail. An example will be great

> 应将http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-graph.focusNodeAdjacency设置为`false`。

thanks
but it isn't the result i want
@pissang  thanks

请问这个功能什么时候会上呢？最近也遇到相应的需求 @deqingli 
目前我是直接修改了sankeyLayout 源码来实现这个需求的
It seems to be a bug.
echarts 不再维护地图数据，可以去 README 上推荐的几个 repo 获取需要的数据
Check this http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xByneRvJyW
Please use a different `stack` name on the second grid.
I have solved this problem, this two  stack's should be different.
tks pissang, yes I just solved this, but also tks your help.
This seems to be a bug.
这个问题是 ECharts 4 去掉 normal 层级引起的，我尽快兼容一下
请问Cannot create property 'pixelRatio' on string 'png'解决了吗？我也碰到了类似问题

> > 请问Cannot create property 'pixelRatio' on string 'png'解决了吗？我也碰到了类似问题
> 
> var typeBase64 = typeFault.getDataURL({
> type: 'png',
> pixelRatio: 1
> });
> 
> 我是这样解决的 希望能帮到你

谢谢你的帮助！
同样遇到了这个问题，clear之后，线还在，但是像是残影一样
Yes that would be a way to add it. Thanks!

var convertData = function (data) {
    var res = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
        var geoCoord = geoCoordMap[data[i].name];
        if (geoCoord) {
            res.push({
                name: data[i].name,
                value: geoCoord.concat(data[i].value)
            });
        }
    }
    return res;
};

option = {
    title: {
        text: '全国主要城市空气质量 - 百度地图',
        subtext: 'data from PM25.in',
        sublink: 'http://www.pm25.in',
        left: 'center'
    },
    tooltip : {
        trigger: 'item'
    },
    bmap: {

                'elementType': 'all',
                'stylers': {

                }
            }, {
                'featureType': 'subway',
                'elementType': 'all',
                'stylers': {
                    'visibility': 'off'
                }
            }, {
                'featureType': 'manmade',
                'elementType': 'all',

                }
            }, {

                'elementType': 'all',

                'elementType': 'labels.text.fill',
                'stylers': {
                    'color': '#999999'
                }
            }]
        }
    },
    series : [
        {
            name: 'pm2.5',
            type: 'scatter',
            coordinateSystem: 'bmap',
            data: convertData(data),
            markPoint: {
                symbol: 'pin',
        symbolSize: 100,
        label: {
          normal: {
            show: true,
            formatter(d) { return d.name; },
          },
        },
                data: [],
            },
            symbolSize: function (val) {
                return val[2] / 10;
            },
            label: {
                normal: {
                    formatter: '{b}',
                    position: 'right',
                    show: false
                },
                emphasis: {
                    show: true
                }
            },
            itemStyle: {
                normal: {
                    color: 'purple'
                }
            }
        },
        {
            name: 'Top 5',
            type: 'effectScatter',
            coordinateSystem: 'bmap',
            data: convertData(data.sort(function (a, b) {
                return b.value - a.value;
            }).slice(0, 6)),
            symbolSize: function (val) {
                return val[2] / 10;
            },
            showEffectOn: 'render',
            rippleEffect: {
                brushType: 'stroke'
            },
            hoverAnimation: true,
            label: {
                normal: {
                    formatter: '{b}',
                    position: 'right',
                    show: true
                }
            },
            itemStyle: {
                normal: {
                    color: 'purple',
                    shadowBlur: 10,
                    shadowColor: '#333'
                }
            },
            zlevel: 1
        }
    ]
};

setTimeout(() => {
const tmp = option.series[0];
tmp.markPoint.data.push({ name: '武汉', coord: [114.31, 30.52] });
myChart.setOption(option)
}, 5000)

I use the line's `splitLine` to overlap the axis of the parallel coordinate system. This method is temporarily solved. The algorithm needs to parse the data into a proportional dimension, that is, the polyline is a line graph, and the axis is in a parallel coordinate system.
